scenario_text.value: Here might be a good spot.

Totally! And if we line up like this, we’ll
all fit!
Huh? What are Minoru and the others doing?

They’re facing the school and holding up
their phones...

Wait... They must be trying to take pictures,
too!
Really? Then let’s join them!
Hey, Minoru! Saki! Let me and Takuma join in!
Look, it’s Takuma and Agumon!

Perfect timing. I was just saying someone
should go find you two.
Find us?

Yeah! We thought it’d be the perfect time for
a group shot!

Minoru’s been all worked up about it. He’s
set on taking a nice group photo.
Sounds good to me! Taking pictures is fun!

Being able to capture a memory with Aoi makes
me happy, too.

Actually, me and Agumon came to take
pictures, too, hehe.
Wow, then it really was perfect timing!

Now that Takuma and Agumon are here, that
leaves...

The professor, Renamon...and Kaito and
Dracmon.
What was that about me and Dracmon?

And what’s the big commotion over here,
anyway?
I heard excited voices. What’s going on?

Apparently they’re thinking of taking some
pictures.

With the professor and Renamon, that means
we’re all here!
All right, let’s get lined up!

Ah, so you want to take a photo of everyone
to remember this moment?
Hehe, yeah. You and Renamon should join, too.
But not everyone can be in the picture.

I’ll take the photo so everyone else can be
together.
Okay, but...
It’s fine.

Having a photo of you all will make me happy,
too.

I’ll join the photo in Haru’s place. It’s not
the same, but I’ll stand in for him.
Thanks, Renamon...
All right, line up everyone!

Looking good. Could everyone get a little
closer, please? That’s it.
All right, and here we go...
Wait!
What is it, Miu?
Over there... There’s something at the gate!
What do you mean, “something”?
An enemy?!
Crap, this can’t be happening!
No, not an enemy! It’s...
...Garurumon!
Uhh...ugh...
Why’s he shaking like that?
Don’t tell me he’s injured?!

(Garurumon? Injured? What the hell
happened?!)
Garurumon!

Don’t get too close, Professor! It’s
dangerous!
I don’t think so! No...

Even if Garurumon holds a grudge against
me...I can’t just abandon him!
It’s you...

Are you okay, Garurumon? Who did this to
you?!

I got into some trouble. But more
importantly...
It isn’t safe here. You need to run...fast.
Not safe? What do you mean?

Survivors from Piedmon’s gang are after me.
Lots of them...
Your injuries look very painful.

I bet he was fighting Piedmon’s followers and
went a little too far.
Huh? Is that you, Renamon...?

Didn’t think you’d still be in that form.
Still hiding it from them?
No, they know my true name and form.

Hmph... So you made amends with the human
children.
Yes. To get Miyuki back.
But enough about me. Let’s talk about you.

Were you fighting the enemy to protect us,
Garurumon?
Hah! Far from it!

I simply couldn’t abide by their way of doing
things... That’s all.

Um, can we save the details for later,
please?
Yeah! We need to focus on those wounds first!

It’s just a scrape, heh... And we don’t have
time to spare.
I’ll be fine. You need to get a move on!
B-But!
I’m fine, now hurry!
Okay... Time to evacuate the area!
All right, Takuma!

Wait! We need to take Garurumon with us! We
can’t leave him here!
Ugh, silly children...
That’s just how they are. Nonetheless...

I’m not willing to abandon you either, as
I said before.
You did say that...
All right, Garurumon! Hang on tight!
Hold it right there!
Ulp... Looks like I wasn’t fast enough.

You’re always too slow, Garurumon! Of course
I caught up with you! Hahaha!
What are you doing here?!

This must be part of Piedmon’s gang that
Garurumon mentioned.
Looks like it.

I only came for the traitor, but I get all
these kiddies to sacrifice, too! What luck!
I can barely contain my joy!
Killing them won’t solve anything!

You should listen to Garurumon if you know
what’s good for you.
Shut up! It’s their fault Piedmon’s dead!

All humans do is bring destruction to our
world!

That’s not true! How many times do I have to
explain?

It was the fog at the altar that swallowed up
Piedmon! They did nothing!
Yeah! The fog came for us, too, after all!
The Master won’t save you from the fog!
Shut up! Just shut up!

It’s not too late, Garurumon. We can still
offer the humans as a sacrifice...
You think I’d do that? Never!

Have it your way then. I’ll sacrifice you,
too!
Human-loving traitor!
